skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the terrain itself is both shield and weapon, enabling the Lizardmen to both mask their numbers and surprise the foe.
Some Lizardmen are able to seamlessly blend in with their jungle environment in order to observe, or defend themselves from, their enemies.
Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: The Oracle’s divining presence can anchor the impassiveness of the braves around him in the most heated of battles.
An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.
Spitting toxic bile, the Troglodon triangulates its victim’s location as the fluid sizzles upon searing flesh.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕ Explosion does not affect friendly troops

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Fireball Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Harmonic Convergence"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: ➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wind Blast"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind Blast Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.
The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.
Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.
"What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."
"The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +5
	(all armies factionwide)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.
